scripts.release:patch: git fetch && git rebase origin/master && npm version patch -m "$npm_config_message" && git push origin master --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: git fetch && git rebase origin/master && npm version minor -m "$npm_config_message" && git push origin master --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: git fetch && git rebase origin/master && npm version major -m "$npm_config_message" && git push origin master --follow-tags
